column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We walked in because my hubby and I were craving Lou's and were really hungry. They were barely busy and we were sat right away... and kept sitting twiddling our thumbs. We waited for ten minutes and walked out after watching employees standing around doing nothing
column4: and not even "hey give us one minute
column5: let me get you some water". NOTHING. As a server
column6: I should apply here because clearly these workers aren't struggling for tips during this pandemic because we were certainly of no importance. Give me one good reason to return because I have none. Consider this a zero star review from an industry pissed off "Karen".
